TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
SE: You die soon.

SP: I can make mods.

Yo,a new page!

Edited July 12, 2022 by Abel101126

SE: You get bugged about updating them to the point the thread gets locked and your mods become forgotten

SP: I know how to pick out what is and isn't a virus online for reasons that do not include parrots and the jolly Roger

SE:But you accidently spotten a black ops and they elemate you.

SP: I have the infinity glove.

SE: the moment you try to use it the gauntlet vaporizes and transports you and you alone into the world of Alice in Wonderland (og Disney animated one) with no way out.

SP: Cryomancy

031407142022

SE: You are always slightly cold.

SP: My plans never fail

SE: The plans don't. You do.

SP: Materialization of imaginary objects.

SE: That thing can't work.

SP: Decrease my IQ.

SE you don’t know how to install mods

SP being jeb

SE: You are a random person named jeb with no capital that will die in 15 seconds

SP: I can get a good night's sleep

SE: You always have a bad day.

SP: Always know and understand the answer to any and all questions.

SE: nobody asks you any questions

SP: the ability to turn any piece of matter into antimatter at will

SE: you can’t turn it back to matter

SP: combining mods

SE: You never have time to play.

SP: Thinking up cool superpowers.

SE: you can’t use them

SP: making ksp2 come out now
Every time you do it, all evidence of ksp2 releasing the first time is removed, including your memory.

SE: you keep forgetting that you forgot.

SP: Complete confidence.

SP You died when trying to fly a car.

SE Ultimate drawing skills

SE: You can only draw pencils

SP: Being OP in War Thunder

Get kicked 

Self explosion

You die if you self explode

Teleporting?

You have to deal with the good 'ol teleporting issue of you dying and the new one just being a copy.

Controlable invisibility

The real bummer is that invisibility allows light to pass through you.  In order to see, light needs to reflect off the back of your eyes.  So,yeah, blinded every time you go invisible.

The ability to eat anything and draw nourishment from it.

SE: once you eat an item you cannot eat it ever again as it no longer can provide any nutrition at all.

SP: geomancy

230910012022

SE: Uncontrollable flatulence

SP: Hurricane force winds

SE: you get blown backwards at category 5 max gust speeds.

SP: immortality

054010022022
